metadata.excerpt: Blog website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, for a freelance contract on Upwork.
metadata.content:
## Introduction

Book Me Today is a blog section I did for bookmetoday.com. This was a freelance project I was contracted for via [Upwork](https://www.upwork.com/). I created the entire blog section with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Purpose and Goal

This was one of my first freelance contracts, and my first freelance contract writing a web page with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The goal was to deliver a modern-looking blog page with the provided content, and ensure that the client was satisfied with the work.

## Tools used

- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript

## Spotlight

My favorite part about this project is how the header turned out. I think that the image overlay fits nicely. I made an emphasis on the theme of productivity throughout the design and development.

## Challenges

Optimizing my workflow was the biggest challenge. Writing plain HTML and CSS can be extremely repetitive if not done efficiently. I made a lot of mistakes and wasted a lot of time at first, but I made sure to refactor a lot of my code to make it more readable for any other developers accessing the source. 

## Main takeaways

Through strong communication, I was able to deliver this website to the client, and they were happy with the result.

## Cosmic
